_meta.description: Domain profile for iMessage, Mail, sharing, and communication shortcuts

prompt_context: You are generating a communication Apple Shortcut. Use sendmessage to send iMessages (specify recipients and body). Use sendemail for email (specify to, subject, body, and optional attachments). Use the share action for general sharing via the system share sheet. When composing messages, always let the user confirm before sending unless explicitly asked for auto-send. Use askforinput to get recipient or message body if not provided. For bulk messaging, iterate with FOREACH but add confirmation before each send.

email.description: Send email with subject and body

share_sheet.description: Share content via system share sheet

example_patterns: Get clipboard, compose message with it, send to selected contact
Build daily report text, email to fixed recipient with subject line
Ask for message and recipient, confirm before sending iMessage
